snippet: OLNICK--Sylvia Nadel. My sincerest condolences to Sylvia Olnick's children, grandchildren and great- grandchildren on my friend's passing. Sylvia's kind and generous nature, her elegance and sense of humor will always be remembered. Bruce S. Simon 1/3
lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia Nadel. My sincerest condolences to Sylvia Olnick's children, grandchildren and great- grandchildren on my friend's passing. Sylvia's kind and generous nature, her elegance and sense of humor will always be remembered. Bruce S. Simon 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  OLNICK, SYLVIA NADEL
